title: Kentucky Derby Winner 2025: Sovereignty
summary: Sovereignty won the 2025 Kentucky Derby with jockey Junior Alvarado, trainer Bill Mott, and owner Godolphin.

title: Kentucky Derby Winner 2024: Mystik Dan
summary: Mystik Dan claimed victory in the 2024 Kentucky Derby, ridden by Brian Joseph Hernandez Jr., trained by Kenny McPeek, and owned by Lance Gasaway, 4 G Racing LLC & Daniel Hamby III.

title: Kentucky Derby Winner 2023: Mage
summary: Mage triumphed in the 2023 Kentucky Derby with jockey Javier Castellano, trainer Gustavo Delgado, and owners OGMA Investments, Ramiro Restrepo, Sterling Racing, and CMNWLTH.
